trans-unit.source: Represents a database field that indicates a one-to-many relationship.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个指示一对多关系的数据库字段。

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET Dynamic Data applications, the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn> class represents a database field that indicates a one-to-many relationship or a parent-child relationship.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 动态数据应用程序中<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn>类表示数据库字段，该值指示一个对多关系或父-子关系。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn> class represents the field in the parent table of the one-to-many relationship.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn>类表示一个对多关系的父表中的字段。

trans-unit.source: However, you can access the child table object by using the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.ChildTable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以通过访问子表对象<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.ChildTable%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also retrieve the foreign-key field in the child table by using the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.ColumnInOtherTable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过使用来检索子表中的外键字段<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.ColumnInOtherTable%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The meta table.
trans-unit.target: 元表。

trans-unit.source: The column provider.
trans-unit.target: 列提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the child table of the one-to-many relationship.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示一对多关系中的子表的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the child table of the one-to-many relationship.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示一对多关系中的子表的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.ChildTable%2A> property to get an object that represents the child table of the one-to-many relationship.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.ChildTable%2A>属性来获取表示一个对多关系的子表的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can access the parent table by using the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.Table%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过访问父表<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.Table%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the foreign-key field in the child table.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示子表中的外键字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the foreign-key field in the child table.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示子表中的外键字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.ColumnInOtherTable%2A> property enables you to get a reference to the field in the child table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.ColumnInOtherTable%2A>属性使您能够获取对子表中的字段的引用。

trans-unit.source: The row that contains the foreign-key field.
trans-unit.target: 包含外键字段的行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path of the list-action page for the child table.
trans-unit.target: 获取子表的列表操作页的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path of the list-action page for the child table.
trans-unit.target: 子表的列表操作页的路径。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenListPath%2A> method when you want to retrieve the list-action page for the child table using the specified row as a parent.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenListPath%2A>当你想要检索使用指定的行作为父级的子表的列表操作页的方法。

trans-unit.source: The path is obtained by appending a query-string value to the URL that contains the foreign-key field value specified in the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 路径通过将查询字符串值追加到包含外键字段值中指定的 URL 获取`row`参数。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenListPath%2A> method is the same as invoking the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenPath%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29> method and passing the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.PageAction.List%2A> action as the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenListPath%2A>方法等同于调用<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenPath%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29>方法并传入<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.PageAction.List%2A>作为第一个参数的操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path for the specified action page of the child table.
trans-unit.target: 获取子表的指定操作页的路径。

trans-unit.source: The target action.
trans-unit.target: 目标操作。

trans-unit.source: The row that contains the foreign-key field.
trans-unit.target: 包含外键字段的行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path of the specified action page of the child table.
trans-unit.target: 获取子表的指定操作页的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path of the specified action page of the child table.
trans-unit.target: 子表的指定操作页的路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenPath%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29> method returns the path of the specified action page for the child table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenPath%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29>方法将返回指定的操作页为子表的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path returned is based on the routes that are defined for the ASP.NET Dynamic Data application and has the specified row as a parent.
trans-unit.target: 返回的路径取决于为 ASP.NET 动态数据应用程序定义的路由，并具有指定的行作为父级。

trans-unit.source: The path is obtained by appending a query-string value to the URL that contains the foreign-key field value specified in the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 路径通过将查询字符串值追加到包含外键字段值中指定的 URL 获取`row`参数。

trans-unit.source: If `row` is `null`, his method returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果`row`是`null`，此方法将返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can use the values defined in the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.PageAction> class for the `action` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用中定义的值<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.PageAction>类`action`参数。

trans-unit.source: The target action.
trans-unit.target: 目标操作。

trans-unit.source: The row that contains the foreign-key field.
trans-unit.target: 包含外键字段的行。

trans-unit.source: The target page.
trans-unit.target: 目标页。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path for the specified action page of the child table.
trans-unit.target: 获取子表的指定操作页的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path of the specified action page of the child table.
trans-unit.target: 子表的指定操作页的路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenPath%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%29> method returns the path of the specified action page for the child table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenPath%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%29>方法将返回指定的操作页为子表的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path is based on the specified path with the specified row as a parent.
trans-unit.target: 路径基于指定行的指定路径，作为父项。

trans-unit.source: The path is obtained by appending a query-string value to the URL that contains the foreign-key field value specified in the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 路径通过将查询字符串值追加到包含外键字段值中指定的 URL 获取`row`参数。

trans-unit.source: If `row` is `null`, this method returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果`row`是`null`，此方法返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If `path` is `null`, the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenPath%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%29> method returns the path based on the routes defined for the ASP.NET Dynamic Data application.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`是`null`、<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn.GetChildrenPath%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%29>方法返回基于为 ASP.NET 动态数据应用程序定义的路由的路径。

trans-unit.source: You can use the values defined in the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.PageAction> class for the `action` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用中定义的值<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.PageAction>类`action`参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes data that might not be available when the constructor is called.
trans-unit.target: 初始化调用构造函数后可能不可用的数据。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 不能直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To customize initialization, you can derive from this class and override the `Initialize` method.
trans-unit.target: 要自定义初始化，你可以从此类派生，并重写`Initialize`方法。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call the base control's `Initialize` method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写此方法，调用基控件`Initialize`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the many-to-many relationship status of the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示列的多对多关系状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the column relationship is many-to-many; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果列关系是多对多，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
